verses.verse: In that day <WH3117> there shall be a fountain <WH4726> opened <WH6605> to the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732> and to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389> for sin <WH2403> and for uncleanness <WH5079>. uncleanness: Heb. separation for uncleanness

And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, that I will cut off <WH3772> the names <WH8034> of the idols <WH6091> out of the land <WH776>, and they shall no more be remembered <WH2142>: and also I will cause the prophets <WH5030> and the unclean <WH2932> spirit <WH7307> to pass <WH5674> out of the land <WH776>.

And it shall come to pass, that when any <WH376> shall yet prophesy <WH5012>, then his father <WH1> and his mother <WH517> that begat <WH3205> him shall say <WH559> unto him, Thou shalt not live <WH2421>; for thou speakest <WH1696> lies <WH8267> in the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068>: and his father <WH1> and his mother <WH517> that begat <WH3205> him shall thrust <WH1856> him through when he prophesieth <WH5012>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, that the prophets <WH5030> shall be ashamed <WH954> every one <WH376> of his vision <WH2384>, when he hath prophesied <WH5012>; neither shall they wear <WH3847> a rough <WH8181> garment <WH155> to deceive <WH3584>: a rough: Heb. a garment of hair deceive: Heb. lie
But he shall say <WH559>, I am no prophet <WH5030>, I am an husbandman <WH376> <WH5647> <WH127>; for man <WH120> taught me to keep cattle <WH7069> from my youth <WH5271>.

And one shall say <WH559> unto him, What are these wounds <WH4347> in thine hands <WH3027>? Then he shall answer <WH559>, Those with which I was wounded <WH5221> in the house <WH1004> of my friends <WH157>.

Awake <WH5782>, O sword <WH2719>, against my shepherd <WH7462>, and against the man <WH1397> that is my fellow <WH5997>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>: smite <WH5221> the shepherd <WH7462>, and the sheep <WH6629> shall be scattered <WH6327>: and I will turn <WH7725> mine hand <WH3027> upon the little ones <WH6819>.

And it shall come to pass, that in all the land <WH776>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>, two <WH8147> parts <WH6310> therein shall be cut off <WH3772> and die <WH1478>; but the third <WH7992> shall be left <WH3498> therein.

And I will bring <WH935> the third part <WH7992> through the fire <WH784>, and will refine <WH6884> them as silver <WH3701> is refined <WH6884>, and will try <WH974> them as gold <WH2091> is tried <WH974>: they shall call <WH7121> on my name <WH8034>, and I will hear <WH6030> them: I will say <WH559>, It is my people <WH5971>: and they shall say <WH559>, The LORD <WH3068> is my God <WH430>.
